epistasis.simulate.utils module¶

epistasis.simulate.utils.remove_epistasis(model, order)¶
Truncate epistasis from a linear epistasis model
and construct a genotype-phenotype from the truncated model.

model: LinearEpistasisModel

order: int,
order of epistasis at which the model is to be truncated.

Module contents¶

Simulate genotype-phenotype maps constructed from epistatic interactions.
